original_text:
Every valley shall be raised up,
    every mountain and hill made low;
the rough ground shall become level,
    the rugged places a plain.
korean_text: 골짜기마다 돋우어지며 산마다, 언덕마다 낮아지며 고르지 아니한 곳이 평탄하게 되며 험한 곳이 평지가 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: Every valley shall be raised up
every mountain and hill made low
the rough ground shall become level
